category.name: wcf.acp.uzbot
category.item: Only the notification must be configured. You can, however, choose, whether the applicant (default) or the group leaders (= acting user) are treated as “Affected User”.

This Bot monitors user group applications and sends respective notifications.

By selecting the Affected User the notification can be sent to either the applicant (standard) or the group leaders.


The following Bot-specific placeholders are available:

[count]Number of applications (always 1)
[applicant-age]Age of applicant
[applicant-email]Email of applicant
[applicant-id]ID of applicant
[applicant-name]Name of applicant
[applicant-profile]Link to the profile of the applicant
[applicant-reason]Reason for application
[group-name]Name of affected group

The following general placeholders are available:

[date]Date of Bot execution
[time]Time of Bot execution
[page]Name of this website, as defined in ACP
[receiver]Username of the receiver of a notification

The following user-specific placeholders are available:

[user-age]Age of the user
[user-email]Email address of the user
[user-groups]Names of the user groups the user is member of
[user-id]ID of the user
[user-name]Name of the user
[user-profile]Link to the user’s profile
[@user-profile]Link to the user’s profile with notification (posts only)
Only the notification must be configured. You can, however, choose, whether the applicant (default) or the group leaders (= acting user) are treated as “Affected User”.

This Bot monitors changes of user group applications and sends respective notifications.

By selecting the Affected User the notification can be sent to either the applicant (standard) or the group leaders.


The following Bot-specific placeholders are available:

[count]Number of applications (always 1)
[applicant-age]Age of applicant
[applicant-email]Email of applicant
[applicant-id]ID of applicant
[applicant-name]Name of applicant
[applicant-profile]Link to the profile of the applicant
[applicant-reason]Reason for application
[group-name]Name of affected group

The following general placeholders are available:

[date]Date of Bot execution
[time]Time of Bot execution
[page]Name of this website, as defined in ACP
[receiver]Username of the receiver of a notification

The following user-specific placeholders are available:

[user-age]Age of the user
[user-email]Email address of the user
[user-groups]Names of the user groups the user is member of
[user-id]ID of the user
[user-name]Name of the user
[user-profile]Link to the user’s profile
[@user-profile]Link to the user’s profile with notification (posts only)
Only the notification must be configured. You can, however, choose, whether the applicant (default) or the group leaders (= acting user) are treated as “Affected User”.

This Bot monitors revoking of user group applications and sends respective notifications.

By selecting the Affected User the notification can be sent to either the applicant (standard) or the group leaders.


The following Bot-specific placeholders are available:

[count]Number of applications (always 1)
[applicant-age]Age of applicant
[applicant-email]Email of applicant
[applicant-id]ID of applicant
[applicant-name]Name of applicant
[applicant-profile]Link to the profile of the applicant
[applicant-reason]Reason for application
[group-name]Name of affected group

The following general placeholders are available:

[date]Date of Bot execution
[time]Time of Bot execution
[page]Name of this website, as defined in ACP
[receiver]Username of the receiver of a notification

The following user-specific placeholders are available:

[user-age]Age of the user
[user-email]Email address of the user
[user-groups]Names of the user groups the user is member of
[user-id]ID of the user
[user-name]Name of the user
[user-profile]Link to the user’s profile
[@user-profile]Link to the user’s profile with notification (posts only)
